entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
